tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Definitely makes students work for their grades. But, he provides an extremely positive learning environment, takes feedback from students, and is clearly a professor who is on the side of his students. The class is hard, but still enjoyable.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: This professor will prepare you for graduate and/or medical school. His expectations for his students meet or exceed those of the average PhD or MD program. If you\'re looking for an easy Bioscience professor, or a soft class to pad your course schedule, I\'d keep looking. He has high expectations for his students.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had him for Immunology. As long as you read the textbook and study the slides, you WILL be fine. Easiest A for me because I actually read the textbook, attended class, and studied. If you don\'t study you wont get a good grade, simple as that.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Excellent teacher, all he wants is for you to attend and an A (with some studying) is extremely doable!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you aren\'t interested in the class, don\'t take it. He expects you to actually learn, and that\'s what college is for. Excellent teacher and has a great accent, like Mr. Eko!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Dr. Thomas makes you LEARN for your grade. Yes, you have to read the book for better clarification, because the subjects he teaches are difficult. I had him for Parasitology as well, which was more intense than his Immunology class. Overall, I would recommend his classes because once it is all said and done, I feel confident in that subject.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Very intimidating. Took the first test and he LAUGHED at the class after they handed it in!! Test true/false questions are ridiculously difficult- be prepared to study every single slide to do decently in the class (aka I studied an entire week/flashcards/the whole nine yards and only got a B on the test).

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: The worst professor I have ever had. Doesn\'t lecture at all, simply tries to give you life lessons. Horrible tests. He constantly contradicts himself. Complains about teaching at RIT. Be his pet and you\'ll get an A, be a student and you\'ll get a D.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Everyone likes to complain about this guy but it boils down to one thing. You came to college to work hard and learn, and that is all he expects. You want to learn take a class with him.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Sped through lectures, spending more time talking about he family and his trips to Africa than the topic. Ended once class with a tirade about how we should all abstain from sex and how his fife had done so so he loved her more for that. Incredibly awkward, tests were ridiculous, avoid if at all possible. Made me hate the class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had him for Parasitology Spring 2010.He is a ridiculous grader.The worst thing is,he tells you on the first day that he doesn\'t give out A\'s. The material is interesting,but he expects your test performance to be at graduate school level.I will never take one of his classes again.I suggest you only take this class if you want your GPA to drop.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This professor made me hate the field of microbiology in reference to parasites. I cannot stand his teaching style. He expects too much to be remembered for the exams and they are practically impossible. He will run out of time and skip over 15 slides then expect you to know this information on the exam. NEVER TAKE HIM - I cannot stress this enough

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I had him for molecular bio lab and he\'s probably been the worst professor I had at RIT. You cant understand him and he never gives anyone above an 80 on a lab report unless your 4th year and you already know everything. He most likely gave out one A to the entire lab section so if your looking for an A in lab you better be the top student.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: i had him for a friday bio lab at 9 and he made it funny. his accent is kind of hard to hear but you get used to it and he tries to speed everything and get you out early. also helps when the procedure gets hard. i recommend him
